name: Imperium of Man
description: The vast, totalitarian interstellar empire comprising the majority of humanity.

name: Forces of Chaos
description: Those who have fallen to the Ruinous Powers of the Warp.

name: Orks
description: A barbaric, green-skinned race obsessed with WAAAGH! and fighting.

name: Tyranids
description: An extragalactic swarm of bio-engineered horrors, consuming all life.

name: Aeldari (Eldar)
description: An ancient, elegant, and dying race, masters of psychic abilities.

name: Necrons
description: Ancient, undying robotic warriors, awakening from millennia of slumber.
